latest_release.name: Version 3.0.0
latest_release.body:
- Fix failing tests [[#88](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/88)]
- Bump minimum supported version to PHP 7.4 [[#87](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/87)]
- Ask user for confirmation before overwriting if file already exists [[#85](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/85)]
- Add back minimum PHP version input [[#83](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/83)]
- Refactor into `get_file_paths_and_names()` function [[#81](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/81)]
- Update to WPCS v3 [[#80](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/80)]
- Use `.gitignore` syntax for `.distignore` [[#78](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/78)]
- Do not match partially matching file names [[#77](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/77)]
- Reformat the `dist-archive.feature` file to use spaces, not tabs [[#75](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/75)]
- Adds an optional `--filename-format=<filename-format>` argument [[#74](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/74)]
- Replace empty namespace autoloader with classmap [[#73](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/73)]
- Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 [[#69](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/69)]
- Ignores .git folder Fix #67 [[#68](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/68)]
- Add test for `.*~` rule in `.distignore` [[#66](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/66)]
- Add theme version to generated archive [[#65](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/65)]
- Only parse `--plugin-dirname` parameter once. Fix #63 [[#64](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/64)]
- Allow `wordpress-core-installer` in `composer.json` [[#62](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/62)]
- Allow for leading slashes in .distignore, and deal gracefully with symlinks [[#61](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/61)]
- Get all tests running on MacOS [[#60](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/60)]
- Support relative paths with and without specified filenames [[#56](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/56)]
- Allow operation without .distignore file [[#55](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/55)]
- Followup of #49, placed the instructions in the correct file. [[#54](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/54)]
- Update testing badge [[#52](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/52)]
- Remove Circle CI configuration [[#51](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/51)]
- Allow to set a directory target without filename [[#49](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/49)]
- Regenerate README file [[#43](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/43)]
- Escape the archive file to allow spaces in path [[#41](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/41)]
- Fixes retrieval of version string from source files doc blocks (fixes #36) [[#37](https://github.com/wp-cli/dist-archive-command/pull/37)]
